summary:
WELCOME TO PULSBOY - PULSBOY IS AN INNOVATIVE BLOCKCHAIN PROJECT AT THE FOREFRONT OF SHAPING THE FUTURE OF DECENTRALIZED TECHNOLOGIES.

 ABOUT US - AT THE HEART OF PULSBOY IS THE SPIRIT OF EXPLORATION AND ADVENTURE, MIRRORING THE DYNAMIC NATURE OF THE CRYPTOCURRENCY SPACE.

 ROADMAP - WITH A COMMITMENT TO INNOVATION, INCLUSIVITY, AND ADAPTABILITY, PULSBOY STANDS AS A SYMBOL OF PROGRESS IN THE WORLD OF CRYPTOCURRENCIES.

 TOKENOMICS - NAME: PULSBOY, TICKER: PULSBOY, TAXES: 6% BUY/SELL
